Miyan taushe bụ ofe e ji pumpkin mee, ndị agbụrụ Hausa na-eri ya n'akụkụ ugwu nke Naịjirịa
A na-ejikarị akwụkwọ yakuwa, dawadawa ( ahịhịa), crayfish, anụ, yabasị na ihe ndị ọzọ na-esi ísì ụtọ akwadebe ofe ahụ.
A na-eme ofe ahụ mgbe a gbasịrị pumpkin ka e wee wepụ mkpụrụ ya
A na-eji anụ sie pumpkin mashed na yabasị na kiubes nke magii.
A na-agbakwunye mkpụrụ osisi a gwakọtara agwakọta, ose, dawadawa na nnu maka uto
A na-agbakwunye obere mmiri ma na-akpali ya n'okpuru okpomọkụ dị ala.
